channel.title: XKey Updates
channel.description: XKey - Vietnamese Input Method for macOS

item.title: Version 1.2.20 (Build 20260224)
item.description:
What's New

fix(XKeyIM): fix icon not displaying in input menu

  • Create proper 16×16pt PDF icons for macOS template rendering
  • MenuIcon.pdf: Vietnam star silhouette (active icon)
  • MenuIconVI.pdf: 'VI' text alternative (backup)
  • Remove MenuIcon.imageset from Assets.xcassets to prevent naming conflicts
  • Update tsInputMethodIconFileKey to reference MenuIcon.pdf

Xem chi tiết trên GitHub
